Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases where both appear consecutively or non-consecutively
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 when followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed versus when followed by SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include a successful reviewer agreement
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the duration until any terminal reviewer outcome (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response) occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2, and then from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed, to evaluate escalation effectiveness
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that ultimately lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed in comparison with the time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in high-complexity variants involving multiple reviewer declines or unassignments
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 was issued, compared to cases where it was not
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 measured as the interval between its timestamp and the next occurring activity in the log, specifically distinguishing outcomes leading to agreement or non-response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and then to SW-Reviewer Agreed to assess the cumulative delay introduced by reminder mechanisms
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include “Assign a Different Editor” versus those that do not, to understand editorial intervention impact
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name to assess per-case responsiveness
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
